hymn.title: I'm so attracted by Your love

layout.singingstanza: I'm so at -- tract -- ed by Your love, And I'm drawn by You In Your sweet -- ness, to pur -- sue, af -- ter You For my full sat -- is -- fac -- tion. I'm in love, I'm in love, I'm in love With the most beau -- ti -- ful One.

lyrics.stanza: I'm so attracted by Your love, And I'm drawn by You In Your sweetness, to pursue, after You For my full satisfaction.
I'm in love, I'm in love, I'm in love With the most beautiful One.
I'm captivated by Your name And I'm charmed by You; With Your fragrance covering me I was gained As You kissed me with Your kisses.
I'm in love, I'm in love, I'm in love With the most affectionate One.
I'm fellowshipping in Your love And rejoicing in You. In Your chambers I enjoy our sweet love For the church, Your satisfaction.
I'm in love, I'm in love, I'm in love With the most intimate One.
